title: MR Center Entertainment
body: MRC Entertainment is one of the largest entertainment companies in Los Angeles. They've worked on movies such as Ted and they've been nominated for 94 Emmy awards.
We have worked on their full website and other internal projects.
When they first approached us, they struggled to succinctly explain all they do and lacked a navigable website.

features.title: What We Have Done.
text: MR Center Entertainment tasked us with creating a clear brand identity and seamless web user experience.

features.title: Services and Result.
text: Branding, Copywriting, Logo Design, Web Design, Web Development
We have provided a fresh launchpad for a new generation of filmmakers to share their stories on a bigger avenue.
